otherNames: The Snow King Has Arrived, 雪王驾到
synopsis: The ice cream scepter was mysteriously stolen. In order to regain the scepter and save the ice continent, Snow King chased the scepter thief all the way to Hunting Valley, and accidentally met the bounty hunter "Boss Rabbit" whose dream is to make money to revitalize the restaurant. In this way, with their own goals, the two started a fun adventure to find the scepter together.
